titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation requiring the members of both houses of Parliament to give their attendance upon the twenty ninth of August instant
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the second day of August 1678. And in the thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
